definition: The term "einzig" refers to something that is unique or singular in nature. It is often used to describe a person, object, or situation that stands out from others due to its exceptional qualities or characteristics. This word is commonly employed to emphasize the distinctiveness or exclusivity of something, highlighting its one-of-a-kind nature.

examples.english: This is the one and only true thing.

examples.german: Sie ist die einzig Richtige für mich.
examples.english: She is the only right one for me.

examples.german: Er ist der einzig Überlebende des Unfalls.
examples.english: He is the sole survivor of the accident.

examples.german: Das ist der einzig mögliche Weg.
examples.english: That is the only possible way.

examples.german: Sie hat ein einziges Ziel vor Augen.
examples.english: She has one single goal in mind.
